review_title: Supportive and collaborative team in Singapore
pros: Close-knit team in Asia, solutions driven, great teamwork. Everyone works towards the same goal.
cons: Small team may not be for everyone.

review_title: Business development role at MI Asia
pros:
Opportunity to attend some of the insightful conferences and meet with some of the greatest speakers and thought leaders of our times
Exposure to senior executives  in the region
Fabulous networking and learning opportunities
Opportunity to be creative and influence the direction of the Asia Center
cons:
Being in a satellite office one always feels a bit isolated from what is happening in the headquarter. 
Early morning hours due to working with LA.

pros: Great work place culture, very friendly mentors and colleagues, unparalleled networking opportunity
cons: Singapore is expensive. And lack of pay for interns would be difficult for international students to consider the internship program
